project_name: London HogWatch at WWT Wetland Centre
project_objectives: Survey hedgehogs at the WWT London Wetland Centre. Because hedgehogs are largely nocturnals, only images taken betwenn 18:00 and 08:00 hs were tagged.
project_stratification_type: Time - only images taken between 18:00 and 08:00 hs were tagged and uploaded to WI
